Mifune jumps up the air, delivers a few slashes, and finishes it with a powerful spinning slash that sends his opponent crashing into the ground.

== Trivia ==
* [[wikipedia:beigoma|Beigoma]] are traditional Japanese spinning tops, usually made of Japanese babylon shell.
